casebody.data:
Adelson Luiz DECASTRO, Administrator (Estate of Jose Luiz Decastro), et al.
v.
ODETAH CAMPING RESORT, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017 Andrew J. Pianka, in support of the petition. Mark R. Cramer, in opposition.

The named plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 581 , 155 A.3d 305 (2017), is denied.
